alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 19 at 4:16AM CDT until April 21 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches and ice accumulations up to around one to three tenths of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake, Southern Lake, Southern Cook and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation and the Fond du Lac Band. * WHEN...From late tonight through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest wind gusts are expected to be localized, with the highest potential for wind gusts up to 55 mph along the North Shore between Silver Bay and Grand Portage on Thursday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
